Sql.query: insert into me_scada_rule( scrucodi, scruabrev, scrudetalle, scruformula, scruactiva, scrulastuser, scrulastdate, scrucodi, scruabrev, scrudetalle, scruformula, scruactiva, scrulastuser, scrulastdate ) values( :scrucodi, :scruabrev, :scrudetalle, :scruformula, :scruactiva, :scrulastuser, :scrulastdate, :scrucodi, :scruabrev, :scrudetalle, :scruformula, :scruactiva, :scrulastuser, :scrulastdate )

update me_scada_rule set scruabrev = :scruabrev, scrudetalle = :scrudetalle, scruformula = :scruformula, scruactiva = :scruactiva, scrulastuser = :scrulastuser, scrulastdate = :scrulastdate, scruabrev = :scruabrev, scrudetalle = :scrudetalle, scruformula = :scruformula, scruactiva = :scruactiva, scrulastuser = :scrulastuser, scrulastdate = :scrulastdate where scrucodi = :scrucodi and scrucodi = :scrucodi
delete from me_scada_rule where scrucodi = :scrucodi and scrucodi = :scrucodi

select scrucodi, scruabrev, scrudetalle, scruformula, scruactiva, scrulastuser, scrulastdate, scrucodi, scruabrev, scrudetalle, scruformula, scruactiva, scrulastuser, scrulastdate where scrucodi = :scrucodi and scrucodi = :scrucodi from me_scada_rule
select scrucodi, scruabrev, scrudetalle, scruformula, scruactiva, scrulastuser, scrulastdate, scrucodi, scruabrev, scrudetalle, scruformula, scruactiva, scrulastuser, scrulastdate from me_scada_rule
select scrucodi, scruabrev, scrudetalle, scruformula, scruactiva, scrulastuser, scrulastdate, scrucodi, scruabrev, scrudetalle, scruformula, scruactiva, scrulastuser, scrulastdate from me_scada_rule
